enhanced_description: Nam Ngiao is a beloved soul-warming soup from northern Thailand that with a pleasant kick of heat. Northern noodle soup with pork blood and tomatoes. This hard recipe takes about 45 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Northern Thai cuisine is characterized by milder flavors, sticky rice, and herbs. The combination of rice noodles, pork ribs, tomatoes creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking affordable authentic Thai cuisine.
